titles.title: CB 50 I Will Give Thanks to Thee

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I WILL GIVE THANKS TO THEE,
O God, among the peoples; I will sing praises to
Thee among the nations. For Thy steadfast love
is great, is great to the heavens, and Thy
faithfulness, Thy faithfulness to the clouds.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Be exalted, O God, above the heavens.
Let Thy glory be over all the earth.
(repeat)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Be exalted, O God, above the heavens.
Let Thy glory be over all the earth.
Be exalted, O God, above the heavens.
Let Thy glory, let Thy glory, let Thy glory be over
all the earth.
